title: Am I the only one who feels that Blackpink as individuals really stand out but as a group they become really dull? - Quora

response.answer_text: I completely agree. When they are by themselves, they each have a chance to shine. There aren't any overshadowed members and it works well. When there are multiple members there, it becomes a problem. Other members are overshadowed and can't shine and people just genuinely focus on one member. Added to that, Yge doesn't promote them as a group well enough, to keep an excited audience.
